channel.title: Comments on: How to Make a Smoothie
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description:
I couldn't just keep the recipe to myself. I had to share it with the world.
I just had another one of my awesome orange/pineapple/blueberry/banana/strawberry smoothies today.
item.content:encoded:
I couldn’t just keep the recipe to myself. I had to share it with the world.

I just had another one of my awesome orange/pineapple/blueberry/banana/strawberry smoothies today.

item.title: By: Echo
item.dc:creator: Echo
item.description: This is the best recipe ever.

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description:
1 cup peanut butter 1 can chocolate energy like ensure or protein stuff 1 banana 1 cup milk
fill with ice. blend.
item.content:encoded:
1 cup peanut butter
1 can chocolate energy like ensure or protein stuff
1 banana
1 cup milk

fill with ice. blend.

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description:
1 can frozen orange juice concentrate 1 cup milk 1 cup sugar
fill blender with ice. don't forget to put the lid on. plug in the blender. hit button closest to the right side of the panel.
item.content:encoded:
1 can frozen orange juice concentrate
1 cup milk
1 cup sugar

fill blender with ice. don’t forget to put the lid on. plug in the blender. hit button closest to the right side of the panel.
